vtkisosurface.cpp File Reference

generate isosurfaces of volume More...

Detailed Description

generate isosurfaces of volume

usage: vtkisosurface([HANDLE], volume, [isoValues | colorLUT], [config, ...])

Parameters:
[in] HANDLE (optional) explicit VTK handle
[in] volume 3 dimensional volume matrix
[in] isoValues (optional) vector of volume values used for isosurfaces
[in] colorLUT (optional) color table (see Color Lookup Tables)
[in] config (optional) config structure (see Configuration parameters)
Only the argument volume is mandatory. If no other parameters are specified, 10 iso values are created automatically from (including) [min ... max].

When the iso values are given explicitly, the surfaces are created at the respective values, using the same color.

If a color table is specified instead, the surfaces are generated on the values in the first column in the table, using the corresponding colors.
